mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AppEvent (appID,appEventContent,appEventCoin,appEventStartTime,appEventEndTime, appEventKey, appEventLimit) VALUES (#{appID},#{appEventContent},#{appEventCoin},#{appEventStartTime},#{appEventEndTime},#{appEventKey},#{appEventLimit})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AppEvent WHERE appID = #{appID} ORDER BY appEventKey ASC
